message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DB, cs.LG 

This paper focuses on automatic Chinese taxonomy construction using data-driven approaches, which involves natural language processing (NLP) and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves information retrieval (IR) and artificial intelligence (AI) techniques, which makes cs.IR and cs.AI likely sub-categories as well. Additionally, the paper deals with large-scale data and database management, which makes cs.DB a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper involves heuristic approaches to improve the precision of the taxonomy, which makes cs.LG (Learning) a possible sub-category as well.
